CatDescriptText: The chalkboard reads: "1. Pauline Hall, 2.Thomas Harper, 3. Barbara Davis, 4. Margaret Winston, 5. Arthur Holloway, 6. Jas. McCoy, 7. Rev. Eberhardt, 8. Eunice Washington, 9. R. W. Twiggs, 10. Joh., 11. Mary Gloster, Livingston Johnson, ...yd Wilson, ...McGarrity, ...Matthews, ...ston."
TitMainTitle: Two men, possibly including Byrd Brown on right, and another on left pointing to chalkboard with list of names, in church with clock reading 10:19 and altar inscribed  "In remembrance..."
